name: Specter
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk ms} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (3d6 damage) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
